name: TeleMedicine Platform with integrated eRx, Labs, Clinical Notes and Ordering Capabilities
description: Developed a comprehensive telemedicine platform with fully immersive audio and video teleconsultation capabilities, integrated electronic prescriptions, lab ordering, and clinical notes management to improve customer retention and physician productivity.
challenge: Healthcare providers needed a complete telemedicine solution that could handle the full patient care workflow remotely, including scheduling, consultation, prescribing, lab ordering, and clinical documentation. The platform needed to provide a fully immersive experience for both providers and patients while maintaining security and compliance.
solution: Built an integrated telemedicine platform featuring patient scheduling and service selection, automated payment and appointment reminders, fully immersive audio/video teleconsultation interface, integrated electronic prescriptions (eRx), lab ordering capabilities, clinical notes management, and secure patient-provider communication tools.
outcomes: Improved customer retention through enhanced user experience
Increased physician productivity with streamlined workflow
Fully immersive teleconsultation experience for providers and patients
Integrated clinical workflow from scheduling to prescription
Enhanced patient engagement through automated reminders
